description:
Appropriate for applications that don't require the strength of pre-sewn slings.

  • This product is sold by the metre
  • Made of nylon
  • 48mm width
  • Breaking strength is approximately 2722kg
  • Not rated for climbing or automobile use. Don't use it for climbing anchors or for DIYing seatbelts in your van. Totally OK for hanging ferns or re-stringing lawn chairs though
name: Web Source 2" (48mm) Nylon Seatbelt Style Webbing
